subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The big question now is how far, for how long and how straight the 75-year-old Swiss president of FIFA, Sepp Blatter, can steer it through waters poisoned by allegations of corruption within its own leadership.
snippet: The big question now is how far, for how long and how straight the 75-year-old Swiss president of FIFA, Sepp Blatter, can steer it through waters poisoned by allegations of corruption within its own leadership.
